name: Thiken
description:
Thiken is a Product Strategy, Design & Development Company based in Austin, TX. Our mission is to create mobile & web centric solutions that accelerate the growth of startups, and help enterprise level companies to rapidly increase their revenue and productivity. We are equipped with a sound knowledge not only in app development, but in research, marketing, branding and growth as well, which makes us the best option for all your mobile-solutions.
Our products are gorgeous in looks, and efficient in their delivery.
As a company we strive to create the best products and to provide the best possible experience imaginable to our clients. We do what we do because we absolutely love doing what we do. "Passion" is a cliché, so just consider us "insanely obsessed."
